name: Delusive Dimensions
description:
Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1!

Delusive Dimensions is a 3d platformer where you must switch dimensions in an attempt to escape the illusion.

This is my first 3d game ever! Please give feedback on how I can improve future projects in 3d!

------------------------

Controls (explained in game):

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

LMB (Left Mouse Button) - Switch Dimensions

------------------------

Credits:

I made everything in the game, but here are some tools / assets I used:

Godot Engine: https://godotengine.org/

Blender: https://www.blender.org/

Beep Box: https://www.beepbox.co/

BFXR: https://iznaut.itch.io/bfxr

Font: https://www.fontspace.com/space-mono-font-f55287

------------------------

As always, thank you for playing!
